info.name: Steam Windows 10 Icon
info.description: Not upgrading to Windows 11? Me nether. It makes more sense to have the platform icon on Steam match the platform you're actually using, so this style reverts all instances of the Windows 11 icon on the Steam web interface with the Windows 10 one. I also made another style for the Windows 7 icon, so you can click on my user profile to find it.
